metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000178 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A heap corruption of type CWE-120 exists in quassel version 0.12.4 inquasselcore in void DataStreamPeer::processMessage(const QByteArray &msg)datastreampeer.cpp line 62 that allows an attacker to execute coderemotely.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000178` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

quassel - 1:0.13.1-1ubuntu2
quassel-client - 1:0.13.1-1ubuntu2
quassel-core - 1:0.13.1-1ubuntu2
quassel-data - 1:0.13.1-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: quassel package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.13.1-1ubuntu2').
